hindi:
पोथी पढ़ि पढ़ि जग मुआ, पंडित भया न कोय।
ढाई आखर प्रेम का, पढ़े सो पंडित होय।
english:
Pothi padhi padhi jag mua, pandit bhaya na koy.
Dhai aakhar prem ka, padhe so pandit hoy.
translation:
Reading loads and loads of books, the world died, but no one became wise.
Just 2.5 letters of प्रेम (love), just read it and you'll becomes truly wise.
